name: Hidden Pocket
flavorText: You hide an object on your person, confident that no matter how thoroughly you are searched, it will not be found.
text: You hide a small object on your person so that it cannot be found. Make a Thievery check with a +10 bonus. Anyone searching you must make a Perception check with a DC equal to your check result to find the item. The DM can modify the DC based on the size of the object.
